resources.string: Welcome to Gracious Gratitudes!\nFollow the steps below to create your very own personalized thank you card.

Dear Friend,
 Thank you for your generous and thoughtful gift. I really appreciate how much you have done for me. Looking forward sharing in many more joyous occasions.
 All the best,
 The wonderful me!

Gracious Gratitudes is a three step process which generates a thank you card.

Follow the steps to personalize your very own thank you card. 

Enjoy!
